**Load up the values extracted from the AVitabile AGB Map**


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
AGB_Avitabile <- read.csv("Data_Output/Avitabile_Data(23-10-2019).csv",stringsAsFactors = F) %>% rename(AGB=mean)
Carbon_Avitabile <- AGB_Avitabile%>% mutate(Avt_Carbon= 0.47*(AGB))
Carbon_NFI <- read.csv("Data_Output/Carbon_Per_Plots.csv", stringsAsFactors = F) %>% rename(NFI_Carbon = Sum_CHa)
NFI_AVI_Carbon <- Carbon_NFI %>% left_join(Carbon_Avitabile, by.x = Plot_names) %>% dplyr::select(-c(EAST, NORTH,AGB)) %>% drop_na(Avt_Carbon)

```

I performed a simple liner regression analysis on the two variables NFI Carbon and Avitabile Carbon. I wish to determine wheter the there is a correlation betetween them.

```{r}
plot(Avt_Carbon~NFI_Carbon, data = NFI_AVI_Carbon)
lm.Avt_NFI <- lm(Avt_Carbon~NFI_Carbon, data = NFI_AVI_Carbon)
anova(lm.Avt_NFI)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data=NFI_AVI_Carbon, mapping= aes(Avt_Carbon,NFI_Carbon, color= Year))+ geom_point()+
   facet_wrap(facets = vars(District))+
  labs(title = "NFI Carbon storage & Avitabile", 
       x= "NFI_Carbon(t/ha)",
       y= "Avitabile Carbon (t/ha)")+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size=7, angle = 45, vjust = 0.5),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 7))
```
